abstract: The race was being closely watched as an indicator of voter mood ahead of the 2012 presidential election.
snippet: The race was being closely watched as an indicator of voter mood ahead of the 2012 presidential election.
lead_paragraph: CHARLESTON, W.Va. - Gov. Earl Ray Tomblin, a Democrat, narrowly won a special election for governor on Tuesday, successfully defending himself against Republican attacks that tried to link him withPresident Obama and his health care overhaul.

headline.main: Democrat Wins West Virginia Governor's Race
